name: 葉繼豪
objective: 知識經濟時代「創新研發」已成為產業最重要的競爭力之一，配合此一趨勢的發展，政府積極招攬國外企業來台設立創新研發中心，同時鼓勵本國企業在台設立創新研發總部，企圖使台灣成為企業的全球研發中心，支援企業從事全球佈局活動所需之技術能力，並使研發服務業成為台灣的重要產業。因此，研發管理人才已成為企業最重要的幹部。為達到契合成本且符合客戶需求之產品設計，本所之研發管理教授課程包含: 產品研發流程與組織架構、產品策略與規劃、確認與掌握客戶需求、品質機能展開、產品規格定義與確認、產品概念開發與測試、產品結構分析、易製造與易裝配設計、品質與目標成本設計、產品穩健性設計(田口品質工程) 、產品工業設計與原型測試、六標準差應用與設計、解決問題之創意激發與訓練(TRIZ)等主題。
schedule:
Introduction
Development Processes and Organizations
Product Planning
Identifying Customer Needs & QFD
Product Specifications
Concept Generation
TRIZ (Theory of inventive problem solving)
Concept Selection
Concept Testing
Product Architecture
Design for Manufacturing,Assemby, cost,  and quality  (optional)
Industrial Design
Prototyping (optional)
R&D Project Management     [Project Management (overall) (optional)]
Product Data Management (PDM) (optional)
Collaborative Product Commerce  (optional)
scorePolicy:
1st report (by team, 20%) (4QFDs)
2nd report (by team, 20%) (TRIZ)
3rd report (by team, 25%) (Overall process planning)
Each class discussion (Choose a member as “project manager”, estimating the time, cost, budget, schedule, and risk) response, creation, and  propose solution (by team, 35%)A team is formed by 4 -5 persons
materials: Karl T. Ulrich and Steven D. Eppinger, 2nd edition, Irwin McGraw-Hill, 2004.
